main event: Multiple witnesses in West Jefferson, Ohio observed a large, bright, round object in the sky for approximately 25 minutes on July 3, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to be brighter than the surrounding stars and comparable in size to a house.
The object changed brightness and moved behind and in front of clouds during the observation.
The witnesses described the object as having a white and blue color with a bright glow around it.
No sound was reported from the object, and it did not appear to have any exhaust or vapor trails.
The witnesses were unable to determine an exact speed, but estimated it was faster than a jet aircraft.
sighted object: A large, bright, round object in the sky
